Package com.im.njams.sdk.communication

Interface InstructionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationInstructionListener, Njams
    public interface InstructionListener
    This interface must be implemented by components which wants to be notified for Instructions and registered on a Receiver.
    Author:
    pnientiedt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onInstruction​(com.faizsiegeln.njams.messageformat.v4.command.Instruction instruction)
      Will be called every time a new Instruction will be received by the Receiver.

    • Method Detail

      • onInstruction

        void onInstruction​(com.faizsiegeln.njams.messageformat.v4.command.Instruction instruction)
        Will be called every time a new Instruction will be received by the Receiver.
        Parameters:
        instruction - the instruction to process
